result.execSummary:
The defendant Dustin L Daniels was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Reckless Injury, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.23(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Dodge Correctional Institution as reception facility. 
Defendant is eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.  
Defendant is eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program.

02/19/2016 AMENDED: DEFENDANT IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR CHALLENGE INCARCERTATION PROGRAM OR SUBSTANCE ABUSE PROGRAM

superMiscConds.notes: Per C-31. Any bond money posted in either 15CF48 or 15CF106 is to be applied towards Restitution. Court orders 25% of defendant's prison wages be applied to the restitution.

If probation or extended supervision is allowed to expire or is revoked with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge and provide current financial information.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for any balances due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.   Attorney Fees To Be Determined.  Probation does NOT collect attorney fees.

Must have absolute sobriety. 
Must not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.

Must complete any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by Probation Agent. Must undergo a psychological evaluation and comply with any follow through. Must participate in Restorative Justice's victim offender conference. Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge.
